name: Vırus Inc Mobile beta
description: Virus inc choose a plague Bacteria , Virus , Fungus , Parasite , Nano Virus , Biological weapon , Covid 19 and Black plague. Choose one and start the apocalypse, of course, there are no other features, activate the symptoms, be stronger, contagion is activated, spread your disease and become the ruler Events Get stronger and cool with the Plague Pass Don't forget to get Plague Points daily Dispel your opponents with the Plague league Note: The Game Is Still In Alpha Internet connection is required to play the game
